title: Is there a certain platform you can use to start writing for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s this thing called Paper. No, not a website. Like sheets of paper. You write with a pen, pencil, marker, crayon, anything that produces ink to write with. You can find paper at Staples or your local supply store. Or Quora. That’s also good.
Aside from Google Docs? novel writing software - bibisco FreeWriter - Free Writing Software Many authors just use Word for windows.
I am eager to start writing but I am not sure which platform is suitable. Looking forward to a guide.
